document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus muscarius species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) with description of thirteen new species from Palaearctic and Oriental regions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus muscarius species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) with description of thirteen new species from Palaearctic and Oriental regions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis . This species resembles species related to
A. livens
Kerremans, 1892
by the color and elytral patterns, but it differs from them by the large eyes, presence of prehumerus, the markedly attenuate elytral apices and by the robust prosternal lobe and prosternal process.
Agrilus nalandae
is similar to
A. aurosus
by the body shape, elytral pubescence, and incised prosternal lobe, although it differs from it by the characters given in the key.

Type series
.
Agrilus nalandae
Théry, 1904
. Holotype by monotypy Ƥ, MNHN : “ Nalanda Ceylan Horn [h] \ Type [p][red ink] \ Agrilus Nalandae [h] Type [p][red ink] Thery [h] \ Muséum Paris Coll. Générale [p] [yellow label]”. Described from a single specimen.
Type locality
. Ceylan , Nalanda.
Specimens examined . Known only from the holotype .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–6. Habitus of 1)
A. nalandae
, Holotype; 2)
A. aurosus
–south Vietnam; 3)
A. aurosus
–Laos; 4)
A. rolciki Jendek
sp. nov.
, Holotype; 5)
A. cuneatus Jendek
sp. nov.
, Holotype; 6)
A. ventrituber Jendek
sp. nov.
, Holotype. Scale bar = 1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis . This species belongs to the group of species having a slender body, larger head and narrow elytral apices (
A. nalandae
,
A. rolciki
,
A. cuneatus
). It is similar to
A. nalandae
by the elytral patterns and to
A. ventrituber
by having tubercles on the basal abdominal ventrite in males.

Type series
.
Agrilus aurosus
Descarpentries & Villiers, 1963
. Holotype : 3 , MNHN : “ Muséum Paris Tonkin Région De Hoa Binh A. De Cooman 1927 [p] \ Agrilus aurosus n. sp. Holotype 3 nob. A. Descarpentries et [h] A. Villiers det. 19 [p] 62 [h] \ Muséum Paris Coll. générale [p] [yellow label]”. Paratypes : 8 exs MNHN , 1 ex ISNB , 1 ex MHNG , 1 ex NMPC . The exact number of paratypes was not specified.
Type locality
. Tonkin : Hoa Binh.
